title: Emerald Radiance Jhumka - పచ్చల జూకాలు
materials: Base metal is plated in 18k gold
adorned with high-quality CZ (Cubic Zirconia) stones. Features a genuine oval-cut emerald in the center and a lustrous faux pearl drop. Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster.
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design featuring floral motifs at the stud. The intricate filigree work on the bell-shaped jhumka is highlighted by the sparkling CZ stones. A pear-shaped faux pearl dangles gracefully, adding a touch of timeless elegance.
colors: and Pearl White create a rich and vibrant color palette.
occasions: Half-Saree function). Also suitable for upscale events and parties where a touch of Indian heritage is desired.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and modern aesthetics. The vibrant emerald adds a touch of royalty, while the CZ stones provide dazzling sparkle. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability, and the timeless design makes it a treasured heirloom. The emerald symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it an ideal gift for special occasions.
